page.title: 17Village clubs and societies.
page.content: {Fiskerton and Morton Sports & Gala {Association}uses the sports ground at Morton for cricket, tennis and football. An annual Gala Day with childrens races is held each summer. Volunteer labour is used to keep the large grassed area in good condition. Morton,{Fiskerton and Rolleston W.I. is a long estabished branch and meets monthly in the church hall at Morton. {Fiskerton Wives'}Group meets monthly at the sports hall. Both these groups normally invite a speaker or demonstrator to their meetings. {The Three Tons Garden Society}holds monthy meetings at the Bromley Arms, Fiskerton. Its main event is the annual horticultural show held in each of the three villages in rotation. {Southwell Round Table}meets in Fiskerton.
